coreAttributes.name: bikini top
coreAttributes.description: A triangle-shaped bikini top. It uses loose strings tied around the neck and back to keep it in place.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the bikini top over [npc.her] chest before tying up the strings at [npc.her] back.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the bikini top over [npc2.namePos] chest before tying up the strings at [npc2.her] back.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(place)] the bikini top over [npc2.namePos] chest before roughly tying up the strings at [npc2.her] back.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the strings of [npc.her] bikini top and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the strings of [npc2.namePos] bikini top and [npc.verb(take)] it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(untie)] the strings of [npc2.namePos] bikini top and [npc.verb(pull)] it off.
